question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Why did the police in Kenosha let an underage boy circulate with a firearm and didn't even attempt to check on him after the shooting? Is it incompetence?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Incompetence, yes, but more so, blatant racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "When they asked for 200 National Guards to be brought in because they were afraid and unable to deal with a legal protest over their incompetence and racism, that was further incompetence.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "When they refused to investigate gun fire in the night or ask the guard to look into it, that was incompetence tinged with racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "When they were preferential to \u201cmilitias\u201d over the diverse National Guard, that was racism tinted with incompetence.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "When they treated black and white participants in the deadly event so differently, that was just plain racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The Kenosha police cover the whole spectrum of gross incompetence (itself a side effect of white privilege in this case) and deadly, systemic racism, with special immunity. Extra points for a chief that goes straight to victim blaming. I bet next, their union will demand a raise.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
